articles.description: Sir Alex Ferguson once said "attack wins you games, defence wins you titles", words that will be encouraging for Liverpool supporters after their strong defensive start to the season.
articles.title: How defensive solidity is powering Liverpool's title bid under Slot

articles.description: Mateo Kovacic finds his scoring boots to get Manchester City back to winning ways, as boss Pep Guardiola jokes it is a "copy and paste" job of Rodri.
articles.title: Mateo Kovacic: Man City's Pep Guardiola praises 'copy and paste' Rodri job

articles.description: England are undone by spin again as Australia's Beth Mooney leads the way in the early stages of the Women's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Australia's Beth Mooney shows England the way

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Villarreal in the Primera División
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.description: Nick Ball defends his WBA featherweight world title in his home city with a punishing 10th round stoppage win over Ronny Rios at Liverpool's M&S Bank Arena.
articles.title: Nick Ball v Ronny Rios: Liverpudlian defends featherweight world title with 10th round stoppage win

articles.description: Harry Maguire says it is easy for Manchester United players to "blame the staff and tactics" but they have "got to do better".
articles.title: Harry Maguire says Manchester United players have 'got to do better' as Erik ten Hag comes under increasing pressure

articles.description: Saturday's Premier League contest at Goodison Park started in homage to Jordan Pickford and ended in very much the same way.
articles.title: Everton 0-0 Newcastle: Pickford penalty save from Gordon 'double bluff'

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes is out of the first Test against Pakistan after failing to recover from a hamstring injury in time.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes out of first Test in Multan

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen let a two-goal lead slip as newly-promoted Bundesliga side Holstein Kiel come from behind to earn a point.
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen 2-2 Holstein Kiel: Alonso's 100th game ends in draw

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs Southampton in the Premier League
articles.title: Arsenal vs Southampton: Premier League - BBC Sport
